page.title: 02BRIDGE STREET
page.content:
{Bridge Street}is very noisy and busy. It seems a very squashed street. Most of the people seem to be old in Bridge Street but they haven't lived there long. There are two pubs called the{Riverside Inn}and the{Soar {Bridge Inn}and there is a garage called{Riverside Cars. }There is only one shop in Bridge Street which is a lady's hairdresser's. There is a cottage called Falstaff and some parts are over 400 years old. There is also a cottage called Clock Cottage. It has a clock in every window and a clock on the ouside of the house. Bridge Stteet used to be called{Briggs {Hill.
{Paula Pilgrim
